body.para: The automatic grease supply unit supplies grease to the drive unit of the machine components. By supplying grease, it smooth the movements of the feed axis. Greasing is done automatically and the greasing period is set in the machine parameters. Replacement of the grease cartridge is necessary when a warning is triggered.
